articles.title: A new adaptation dims the brilliance of Elena Ferrante’s novel
articles.description: The Italian-American television series loses the book’s essential interiority, and paints everything in pastel tones
articles.content: FERRANTE FEVER is no longer restricted to pastel-coloured paperbacks in bookstores across the world. The pseudonymous authors four Neapolitan Novels, which track the friendship between two women over half a century, have sold more than 5.5m copies. Now they a… [+4282 chars]

articles.title: Airports have been hit by the rise of Uber and Lyft
articles.description: They are looking at ways to make up falling revenues from car parking and car rentals
articles.content: THE EMERGENCE of app-based ride-hailing services such as Uber and Lyft has transformed the way business travellers get to and from the airport. And it has also blown a hole in the finances of many airports. Under threat, particularly in North America, is thei… [+3375 chars]

articles.title: Why there has been no progress in nuclear talks with North Korea
articles.description: The North is using the vague language of the Singapore agreement to stall the process
